Battera::
She flew in close to CyberShark. "Who are we supposed to be helping 
here?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron/Cerberus/Dachande/Jynx/Obitus/AEger/
> Fame/Bellum/Neamen Hydra/Eclipse/Wolveritron::
> 
> Magmatron and Cerberus were ready to go, they had weapon systems on 
and guns aimed, but they did not fire. They watched as vollys were 
being fired.
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Jynx and the Four Nightmares opened fire on The Oblitercons. They 
fire one shot each at them and turn to look at Magmatron and 
Cerberus, their leaders. They weren't firing so Jynx and the 
Nightmares stopped.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Neamen Hydra went to Hydra mode and went into a frenzy, she shot at 
The Oblitercons, Deamon Wulf, Dark Claw, Flesh Ripper, Six Shot, 
Ares, Manterror, Injector, BumbleBee, Double Punch, and Unitron. Then 
he falls to the ground, tired from his frenzy. He crawls away from 
the battle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Eclipse and Wolveritron didn't know who to fire at so they watched 
to see who fired at the ones they came here with.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Dachande, in robot mode, climbed a tree, there he cloaked and 
targeted Alliance members. Using his shoulder cannon he shot at 
BumbleBee and then at Injector. He pulled out his spear gun and fired 
at Double Punch and Unitron. His cloak dropped because of the gun but 
he sat up in the tree, still pretty much unable to be seen by the 
naked optic and waited for another great hunting opportunty.
